### Orange County City Trends

```{r get_plots}
source("code/functions.R")
cities_of_interest <- c("Irvine", "Costa Mesa", "Mission Viejo", "Newport Beach", "Lake Forest")
plots <- get_city_plots(cities_of_interest)
```
